definition.name: Drawer
definition.purpose: Provides a root container for a UI drawer component.
definition.description: A wrapper component for the root of a drawer interface, using the vaul DrawerPrimitive. It manages the open/close state and provides the context for all drawer subcomponents.

initial.data: Drawer is closed by default unless controlled via props.

when.description: User interacts with the trigger or programmatically opens the drawer.
User closes the drawer or it is closed programmatically.

definition.visualLayout: Root container for the drawer, which overlays content on the page.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps DrawerPrimitive.Root from vaul. Accepts all props supported by DrawerPrimitive.Root.

definition.name: DrawerTrigger
definition.purpose: Provides a trigger element to open the drawer.
definition.description: A wrapper for DrawerPrimitive.Trigger, used to open the drawer when interacted with (e.g., clicked).
definition.visualLayout: Trigger element, typically a button or icon.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps DrawerPrimitive.Trigger from vaul. Accepts all props supported by DrawerPrimitive.Trigger.

definition.name: DrawerPortal
definition.purpose: Renders the drawer in a React portal.
definition.description: A wrapper for DrawerPrimitive.Portal, used to render the drawer outside the normal DOM hierarchy, typically at the end of the document body.

children.description: The content to render in the portal.

initial.data: Portal is not rendered until drawer is open.

effects: Portal is rendered with drawer content

definition.implementationNotes: Wraps DrawerPrimitive.Portal from vaul. Accepts all props supported by DrawerPrimitive.Portal.

definition.name: DrawerClose
definition.purpose: Provides a button or element to close the drawer.
definition.description: A wrapper for DrawerPrimitive.Close, used to close the drawer when interacted with (e.g., clicked).
definition.visualLayout: Close button or element inside the drawer.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps DrawerPrimitive.Close from vaul. Accepts all props supported by DrawerPrimitive.Close.

definition.name: DrawerOverlay
definition.purpose: Renders a semi-transparent overlay behind the drawer.
definition.description: A wrapper for DrawerPrimitive.Overlay, providing a darkened background behind the drawer and handling click-to-close behavior.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the overlay.

initial.data: Overlay is hidden unless drawer is open.

enabled: Overlay can be clicked to close drawer

definition.visualLayout: Full-screen semi-transparent overlay behind the drawer.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps DrawerPrimitive.Overlay from vaul. Uses cn utility for className merging.

definition.name: DrawerContent
definition.purpose: Renders the main content area of the drawer.
definition.description: A wrapper for DrawerPrimitive.Content, providing the main content area of the drawer, including layout, styling, and optional drag handle.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the content area.

children.description: The content to display inside the drawer.

initial.data: Drawer content is hidden unless drawer is open.

definition.visualLayout: Main content area of the drawer, styled for different directions (top, bottom, left, right).
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps DrawerPrimitive.Content from vaul. Uses DrawerPortal and DrawerOverlay. Includes a drag handle for bottom drawers.

definition.name: DrawerHeader
definition.purpose: Renders a header section inside the drawer.
definition.description: A styled div for the header area of the drawer, typically used for titles or navigation.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the header.

initial.data: Header is rendered as part of the drawer content.

definition.visualLayout: Header area at the top of the drawer content.
definition.implementationNotes: Styled div using cn utility for className merging.

definition.name: DrawerFooter
definition.purpose: Renders a footer section inside the drawer.
definition.description: A styled div for the footer area of the drawer, typically used for actions or additional information.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the footer.

initial.data: Footer is rendered as part of the drawer content.

definition.visualLayout: Footer area at the bottom of the drawer content.
definition.implementationNotes: Styled div using cn utility for className merging.

definition.name: DrawerTitle
definition.purpose: Renders a title for the drawer.
definition.description: A wrapper for DrawerPrimitive.Title, used to display the title of the drawer with appropriate styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the title.

initial.data: Title is rendered as part of the drawer header.

definition.visualLayout: Title text styled as a heading in the drawer.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps DrawerPrimitive.Title from vaul. Uses cn utility for className merging.

definition.name: DrawerDescription
definition.purpose: Renders a description for the drawer.
definition.description: A wrapper for DrawerPrimitive.Description, used to display a description or supporting text for the drawer.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the description.

initial.data: Description is rendered as part of the drawer header or content.

definition.visualLayout: Description text styled as supporting text in the drawer.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps DrawerPrimitive.Description from vaul. Uses cn utility for className merging.
